traits.Magic Resistance: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Regeneration: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.Multiattack: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Constitution saving throw or be infected with a diseasexe2x80x94a minuscule slaad egg.
